item.title: Dar-Blat! Almost perfect accuracy! GUARANTEED High Score! Working!
item.dc:creator: @dragonmasterscott dragonmasterscott
item.description:
@dragonmasterscott wrote:

Alright guys this is my second script written and it got me a gold trophy! Here you go…

//************************************************************************//
//*** Made by: dragonmasterscott //
// For: moparisthebest.org //
// Drag the crosshair to the game window, “CTRL + ALT + R” to start ***//
//************************************************************************//

Program DarBLATPlayer;

Var
MousX, MousY : Integer;

Begin
ClearDebug
//Display credits
WriteLn(’////’)
WriteLn(’// Dar-BLAT!!! Auto-Player //’)
WriteLn(’// Made by: dragonmasterscott //’)
WriteLn(’// For: moparisthebest.org //’)
WriteLn(’////’)
Wait(250);
ClickMouse(345,425,true);
Wait(1000);
WriteLn(‘Waiting for Darblat…’);
While Not(FindColor(MousX,MousY,1751807,0,20,75,150))Do
Begin
Wait(5);
End;
Wait(130);
KeyDown(32);
wait(50);
KeyUp(32);
WriteLn(‘BOOOOOOOOOMMMMMMM !’);
End.

Read full topic
item.source: Dar-Blat! Almost perfect accuracy! GUARANTEED High Score! Working!
